file_content.text: My efforts to defeat the Ulgo garrison at House Panteer are ongoing. You gave me and House Thul this chance. Again, my thanks.
I took care of the Organan offensive. The Ulgos too.
Now our army will easily take the castle! This could deliver an alliance with House Panteer!
House Thul and the Empire have you to thank.
Don't mention it.
It was nothing. All in a day's work.
Don't mention it.
You are too humble.
Don't take the credit.
They will sing songs about your valor.
Time to pay me.
Of course. I've even dipped into my personal commission.
May only victory find you. For the glory of the Empire!
Organa's forces are no longer an issue.
Excellent! When House Panteer sees the effectiveness of my troops, they'll be sure to seek an alliance.
The battle at the former Panteer castle awaits. Wipe out enough Organa soldiers to doom their offensive. Hurry.
Ah, so you're here now, too. Soon everyone will know that House Panteer wasn't wiped out when House Ulgo invaded and took their castle.
Inside, political leaders from House Thul and House Organa stumble over each other to win Panteer's favor and a future crown.
The inner workings of the Alderaan houses put me to sleep.
Politics bore me.
I am of like mind, believe me, but these details directly inform my job.
Many wars are won in the back rooms of government chambers.
Politics is a deadly game.
Indeed. But I prefer to win them on the battlefield.
Identify yourself.
I'm here to help the Empire any way I can.
Let's hope House Thul wins.
Then I'm glad we've run into each other.
I am General Gurveer, commander of the Third Battalion, and I'm taking it upon myself to win House Panteer's allegiance to the Empire.
House Organa has just launched a surprise attack to liberate Castle Panteer from the occupying Ulgo forces.
Thul's leaders were planning a similar campaign, but Organa has beaten us to it. If they succeed, House Panteer will be beholden to Organa.
If your house was too slow to act, you only have yourselves to blame.
It's Thul's own fault.
I agree. Rather than implore Thul leadership to act, I should do it myself.
Over my dead body.
Good, because you are in a position to help ensure Organa fails.
Why inform me of this?
I believe you can play a pivotal role.
My men already march on the castle, preparing to decimate the Organan offensive. You could attack before they arrive, ensuring a Thul victory.
Wipe out enough Organa forces so that defeat is imminent. Their failure will expose them as weak to Panteer.
A very clear plan.
If you're up to it, I have another wrinkle.
I'll just kill them all.
That will work too. In fact....
While there, if you could take a large enough bite out of Ulgo, you'll make our cleanup that much easier.
But Organa's failure is paramount, so concentrate your effort on their ranks and see me when you're done.
Sounds futile. [Refuse quest]
Your prerogative. If you change your mind, I could really use you. Good day.
This is a contested area. Be on the lookout for the enemy.
